name: Level Frames
headline: Software eats custom framing
description:
Level Frames is making it more convenient, affordable and intuitive to custom frame posters, prints, photos and more. By bringing the entire experience online and offering amazing support, we can help make your walls in your home or office look amazing at a fraction of the price and turnaround time of a traditional frame shop. 

Level was founded in 2014 and is based in New York, United States.

founders.name: Josh Hubball, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Building @Levelframes. Fan of music, tech, analog photography, being a dad and the Sawx.

Framing Made Simple
# Online custom framing for artwork and photos.
Delivered to your door.
[Start Framing ](http://levelframes.com/</guide> "create a custom picture frame")
## Beautifully frame any photo or print without leaving the house
![Custom Frames](https://d29mtkonxnc5fw.cloudfront.net/site_assets/black-maple-custom-frame-small.jpg)
![frame artwork](https://d29mtkonxnc5fw.cloudfront.net/site_assets/home-feature-image2.jpg)
![Custom Picture Frames Online](https://d29mtkonxnc5fw.cloudfront.net/site_assets/gallery-wall-weathered-natural.jpg)
The artwork you've collected should be on the wall, not trapped in a shipping tube or on your camera roll. We've made it easier to beautifully frame posters, prints and pictures. Each [custom frame](http://levelframes.com/</custom-frames-online> "design a custom picture frame") or [framed photo](http://levelframes.com/</photos> "frame a photo") is handcrafted using museum-quality materials and delivered to your door in a couple weeks.
Design a [custom frame for art](http://levelframes.com/</custom-frames-online>) you already have, or [upload and frame a picture](http://levelframes.com/</photos>) from your phone or computer and we'll print and custom frame your photo and ship to your door.
[What can you frame?](http://levelframes.com/<#>)
## Online Framing for Art & Photos
Skip the trip to the frame shop or post office. We make it simple to frame from home, or to send items in to be expertly framed in our studio. **See how it works.**
[ ![how to frame a photo online](https://d29mtkonxnc5fw.cloudfront.net/site_assets/new-photos-vid-thumb.jpg) ](http://levelframes.com/</frame-a-picture-how-it-works>)
Framing a Digital Photo
[ ![how online framing works | level frames](https://d29mtkonxnc5fw.cloudfront.net/site_assets/new-video-thumb.jpg) ](http://levelframes.com/</frame-artwork-how-it-works>)
Framing a Print
We stand by our work with a [100% Happiness Guarantee](http://levelframes.com/<https:/help.levelframes.com/placing-an-order/100-happiness-guarantee>)
## [ Collage Picture Frames  Choose from a popular collage design or make your own! Learn More ](http://levelframes.com/</collage-picture-frames> "collage picture frames - customize your collage frame")

[ ![framing a photo - how it works](https://d29mtkonxnc5fw.cloudfront.net/site_assets/select-photo-from-phone3.jpg) 1 Upload a photo from your phone or computer. ](http://levelframes.com/<#>)
![choose frame options for your photo](https://d29mtkonxnc5fw.cloudfront.net/site_assets/choose-frame-options2.jpg)
2
Choose a print size and frame options.
![print and framing photos online](https://d29mtkonxnc5fw.cloudfront.net/site_assets/finished-framed-photo4.jpg)
3
We'll print and frame your photo and ship it to your door.
[ Upload Photo](http://levelframes.com/<#>)
Customize your frame in seconds with our unique frame editor. Get started below!
## [ Gallery Walls  Transform a room in your home with a beautiful gallery wall design. Learn More ](http://levelframes.com/</gallery-walls> "Gallery Walls")
## What Can You Frame?
[ ![online framing - custom frames for artwork & photos](https://d29mtkonxnc5fw.cloudfront.net/site_assets/online-framing-for-artwork.jpg) ](http://levelframes.com/</guide>)
### Artwork
Your handcrafted frame will be made to fit your artwork size and shipped to your door with everything you need to frame your artwork. If easier, you can mail items to us for custom framing and we'll send everything back ready to hang.
[See How At-Home Custom Framing Works](http://levelframes.com/</how-it-works>)
[Start Framing](http://levelframes.com/</guide>)
[ ![frame photos online](https://d29mtkonxnc5fw.cloudfront.net/site_assets/framed-photo-weathered-black-toned.jpg) ](http://levelframes.com/</photos> "frame a picture")
### Your Photos
Make moments last a lifetime. Upload an image, select a print size and customize the frame. Your custom-framed photo will be made & shipped to your door within 1-2 weeks.
[Learn More About Framing a Picture](http://levelframes.com/</photos>)
[Create a Gallery Wall with Your Best Pictures](http://levelframes.com/</gallery-walls>)
[ Upload Photo](http://levelframes.com/<#>)
[ ![online framing - custom frames for artwork & photos](https://d29mtkonxnc5fw.cloudfront.net/site_assets/online-framing-for-artwork.jpg) ](http://levelframes.com/</guide>)
### Artwork
Your handcrafted frame will be made to fit your artwork size and shipped to your door with everything you need to frame your artwork. If easier, you can mail items to us for custom framing and we'll send everything back ready to hang.
[Start Framing](http://levelframes.com/</guide>)
[See How At-Home Custom Framing Works](http://levelframes.com/</how-it-works>)

Tell a story with up to five photos in one, fully-customizable collage.
[Start Designing](http://levelframes.com/</collage-picture-frames> "design a collage picture frame")
[ ![framed vinyl records](https://d29mtkonxnc5fw.cloudfront.net/gift_page/arcade-fire-gift-cover.jpg) ](http://levelframes.com/</vinyl> "framed vinyl records")

[ ![custom frames online](https://d29mtkonxnc5fw.cloudfront.net/site_assets/year-round-gifts.jpg) ](http://levelframes.com/</gifts> "framed photo gifts and more")
### [Year-Round Framed Gifts](http://levelframes.com/</gifts> "framed artwork gifts and more")
Make anyone feel special with personalized, frame-worthy gifts.
[See Gift Ideas](http://levelframes.com/</gifts> "custom frame gift ideas")
## The Thoughtful Gift
Beautifully printed & framed photos. We'll add gift wrapping and a personalized note at no extra cost.
[Frame a Photo](http://levelframes.com/</photos>)
![Frame pictures online](https://d29mtkonxnc5fw.cloudfront.net/site_assets/perfect-gift-small2.jpg)
![Frame a photo online](https://d29mtkonxnc5fw.cloudfront.net/site_assets/gift-open-girl.jpg)
![wirecutter best online framing companies](https://d29mtkonxnc5fw.cloudfront.net/site_assets/wirecutter-logo.jpg)
### Level Frames selected as one of the best online framing companies 2024
Also Loved By...
![best online picture framing reviews](https://d29mtkonxnc5fw.cloudfront.net/site_assets/also-seen-in2.jpg)
### ["It's still not even close. @levelframes is still the absolute best / fastest / cheapest way to frame a thing. Seriously."](http://levelframes.com/<https:/twitter.com/alexisohanian/status/1009609302926127104>)
![twitter logo](https://d29mtkonxnc5fw.cloudfront.net/site_assets/twitter-carousel-logo.png)
@AlexisOhanian
Founder of Reddit
##  Frame Your Life 
Commemorate unforgettable moments by framing your favorite photos or mementos.
We'll make sure each print is perfect before handcrafting the museum-quality frame, and ship it out within days.
[![Print and frame wedding photos](https://d29mtkonxnc5fw.cloudfront.net/site_assets/wedding2_square.jpg)](http://levelframes.com/</framed-wedding-photos>)
[Wedding Photos](http://levelframes.com/</framed-wedding-photos>)
[ ![frame pictures and photos online](https://d29mtkonxnc5fw.cloudfront.net/site_assets/frame-dog-photos.jpg) ](http://levelframes.com/</photos> "frame a photo")
[Best Buds](http://levelframes.com/</photos> "frame pictures")
[ ![best custom framing service](https://d29mtkonxnc5fw.cloudfront.net/site_assets/favorite-artwork.jpg) ](http://levelframes.com/</custom-frames-online>)
[Favorite Artwork](http://levelframes.com/</guide>)
A custom frame is the best way to display and protect prints, posters and photos that have special meaning to you. Each one of our frames is handcrafted to order in the USA with archival components and the highest standards. Our goal is to help on your next framing project, and many more to come.
Your favorite pictures should be up on your wall, not trapped in your phone

[Frame a Picture](http://levelframes.com/</photos> "frame a picture")
![Quality ribbon4](https://d29mtkonxnc5fw.cloudfront.net/site_assets/quality-ribbon4.svg)
Museum-Quality in Every Frame

The artwork you've collected should be on the wall, not trapped in a shipping tube or on your camera roll. We've made it easier to beautifully frame posters, prints and pictures. ## Online Framing for Art & Photos

generated_description:
### Level Frames: Framing Reimagined

**Company Overview**  
Level Frames is a New York-based e-commerce company that revolutionizes custom framing by bringing it entirely online. Founded in 2014 and a proud member of Y Combinator's W15 batch, Level Frames is on a mission to make custom framing more convenient, affordable, and intuitive. With a small but dedicated team of five, the company is committed to transforming walls in homes and offices with beautifully framed artwork.

**Mission**  
At its core, Level Frames believes that "software eats custom framing." The goal is straightforward: to enhance the framing experience by seamlessly integrating technology, thus eliminating the inefficiencies of traditional frame shops. Their offering enables customers to frame anything from posters and photos to prints—all while delivering a premium product at a fraction of both the cost and turnaround time seen in conventional framing.

**What They Offer**  
Level Frames empowers users to create custom frames with ease, whether it’s for artwork, personal photos, or unique items like vinyl records. Their website allows customers to:
- **Frame a Photo**: Simply upload an image, choose your frame, and have it delivered.
- **Custom Frames**: Design frames for art prints and other works on paper.
- **Gallery Walls**: Curate a stunning arrangement with framed artworks.
- **Framing Tips & DIY**: Guidance for those who prefer a hands-on approach.

The materials used are of museum quality, ensuring that each piece not only looks incredible but also stands the test of time—because your memories deserve to be displayed elegantly.

**Unique Selling Proposition**  
What sets Level Frames apart is their 100% Happiness Guarantee, reflecting confidence in their craftsmanship. They also promote a positive customer journey with outstanding support available via chat, email, or phone.

**Community and Culture**  
Though a compact team, Level Frames shares a clear vision of excellence and customer satisfaction. They engage with the artistic community, supporting not just individual customers but also partnerships with artists, photographers, and interior designers, showing their commitment to both craftsmanship and creativity.

**Conclusion**  
In a world where every image can be digitized and shared, Level Frames brings those memories back into the physical realm where they belong—on the walls of our lives. With their effective blend of technology and artistry, framing doesn’t have to be a daunting task anymore; it can be a delightful experience. For those looking to bring some of their own art to life, Level Frames offers a noticeable step up from the ordinary framing shop.

Visit [Level Frames](http://levelframes.com) to get started on framing your memories today!
